name: DnR Lumbung Garden
address: Klumpu, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Rooms were very comfy and quiet. The staffs were also superb, once we arrived, we were offered with welcome drink (tea/coffee). And everytime we went back to accomodation after exploring, the also offered to prepare tea/coffee again. Such a nice gesture.
review 2:
Absolutely lovely family. We did not want to leave.
Delicious breakfast. Especially the sandwiches.
Good, central location giving you the opportunity to visit different beaches on the island.
Close to the harbour. Peace and quiet.
Very hot water with good pressure.
Nice pool area and plenty of space to relax.
Water refill available.
review 3: This is our first time to come here. To Visit Nusa Penida. We would like to a while we have vacation we also want to have praying In Penataran Ped Temple. We just stayed here for one night. It's amazing experiences. With cone house by wooden and with swimming pool also. And the prices realy good for us. And don't worries here also have WiFi and free breakfast. Or some beer ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòâü§§. Thank you so much to Bapak Dimas for serve us as well. I hope your bussiness going well in the next and in the future.
review 4: Stayed here with a friend last week. Very down to earth and nice staff. The bathroom could use a new light and the Wifi is not the best‚Ä¶ otherwise we had a good stay there.
review 5: It‚Äôs like a 20 min drive by scooter from all the main locations but that makes it a peaceful place. The staff are so friendly and the atmosphere is incredible. It‚Äôs also very welcoming, it feels very homey

name: Warung Monink
address: Unnamed Road, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Great authentic traditional Indonesian food. Nice atmosphere and this warung serves the best portion size ever! Recommend. I think the chicken fried rice was 30k üëç
review 2:
Lovely family-owned little restaurant. They don't speak English and they only make the traditional Indonesian dishes.

When we arrived it was closed, we asked "halo?!" and a young lady opened up for us (and more costumers also joined later).
The atmosphere is very authentic.
review 3: This is a really nice place to eat! They don't have a menu and don't even speak english, but you can use your Google Translate to order whatever you want or make it easy and ask for a Mie Goreng (the portion is massive and it's really good!). Don't forget to say very clear NO SPICY if you don't want your tounge to be incineratedüòÖ
review 4: Massive portions at a very affordable price. We came here twice during our stay at Klumpu area. She doesn‚Äôt rly have a fixed menu when we cave (prolly bc covid) so you kinda just order whatever you want and she‚Äôll fix it in her kitchen if she has the ingredients. All of our orders came out amazing. Get her sambal tomat!
review 5: The food was nice but it was (for Bali standards) very expensive. About 60k per meal. The shipowner was really kind though.

name: Garuda penida tour
address: jl raya metaki, Klumpu, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
We had Bayu as our driver (more like a tour guide) for 2 days on Nusa Penida Island. Bayu is very friendly, honest and helpful. He did a great job with reasonable price, i think we got way more than what we paid.
He is very considerate, he did little small things for us without asking.

I definitely recommend Bayu for anyone coming to Nusa Penida. ‚ù§Ô∏è
